[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Edge: Genesis] [Genesis CommitVote] Can CommitVotes be created for genesis block (round 0), and is this handled correctly in aggregation? (Medium)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Edge: Reconfiguration] [Reconfiguration Boundary] During epoch reconfiguration, can CommitVotes cross epoch boundaries causing validator set confusion? (Critical)
[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Edge: Empty Validator Set] [No Validators] What happens if ValidatorVerifier has empty validator set when verifying CommitVote? (High)
[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Edge: Single Validator] [Single Validator Mode] In single-validator mode (quorum=1), does CommitVote verification work correctly? (Low)
[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Edge: Maximum Round] [Round Overflow] What happens when round approaches u64::MAX - can CommitVotes still be created and verified? (Low)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [DoS: Verification] [Verification Flooding] Can an attacker flood validators with invalid CommitVotes forcing expensive signature verification operations? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [DoS: Memory] [Vote Cache Exhaustion] Can attacker create CommitVotes for many future rounds to exhaust pending_commit_votes cache memory? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [DoS: CPU] [Signature Aggregation Cost] Can submitting many CommitVotes with different LedgerInfo values cause expensive repeated aggregation attempts? (Medium)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Testing: Property] [Property Violation] Are there untested property invariants in CommitVote that could be violated by malicious inputs? (Medium)
[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Testing: Coverage] [Edge Case Coverage] Are all error paths in verify() and new() properly covered by tests? (Low)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Integration: RB] [Broadcast Ordering] When CommitVotes are broadcast via reliable broadcast, can message reordering cause votes to be processed incorrectly? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Integration: RB] [Duplicate Delivery] Can reliable broadcast deliver same CommitVote multiple times, and is deduplication handled correctly? (Medium)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Optimistic: Flag Toggle] [Feature Flag Race] Can toggling optimistic_sig_verification flag mid-flight cause some votes to be verified and others not? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Optimistic: Batch Verification] [Batch Failure Handling] When batch verification of CommitVotes fails, are all votes individually verified or could some invalid votes slip through? (Critical)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Optimistic: Pessimistic Set] [Set Growth] Can pessimistic_verify_set grow unbounded if many validators submit bad votes, causing performance degradation? (Medium)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Optimistic: Status Reset] [Status Reset Timing] When is verification_status reset to false, and could this timing be exploited to bypass verification? (Critical)
